job.title: [Seattle] Machine Learning Engineer, NLP (Junior & New Grad)
job.description: <strong><u>About News Break<br><br></u></strong><strong>Description<br><br></strong>News Break defines a new way for users to engage with local news. Since its founding in 2015, it has grown by leaps and bounds. We’re the nation's largest intelligent local news platform!<br><br>News Break is ranked the #1 news app on both iOS and Android in 2020 with 45M+ monthly active users.<br><br>We're a series-C startup headquartered at Mountain View, California.<br><br>For more information, visit www.newsbreak.com/about<br><br><strong><u>About The Role<br><br></u></strong><strong>Responsibilities<br></strong><ul><li>Develop highly scalable tools leveraging machine learning models to solve problems such as text classification, document clustering, topic modeling, text generation and recommendation</li><li>Develop in-house machine learning tools and pipelines to support fast experimentation of machine learning models</li><li>Work with other engineers to identify and solve machine learning problems<br></li></ul><strong><u>Minimum Qualifications<br><br></u></strong><strong>Requirements<br></strong><ul><li>Experience in one or more of the following areas: deep learning, natural language processing, recommendation systems, and data mining</li><li>Experience with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch or MXNet</li><li>Expert knowledge in C/C++ and Python<br></li></ul><strong><u>Preferred Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li>MS degree in Computer Science or related quantitative field with 3+ years of machine learning related work or research experience, or PhD degree in Computer Science or related quantitative field</li><li>Contributions to research communities/efforts, including publishing papers in machine learning (AAAI, ICLR, NeurIPS, ICML, KDD, CVPR)<br></li></ul><strong><u>Benefits<br><br></u></strong>We provide a highly competitive compensation package including base salary, bonuses, and stock options. Benefits include great Medical, Dental and Vision. A flat organization and family-like culture makes this a perfect environment to make huge impact on our product and grow your skill set.
